message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair offer considering the value this product brings.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
